product_overview: TradingPro is an AI-powered professional trading platform designed to empower traders with institutional-grade tools, real-time market data, advanced AI-driven insights, and comprehensive portfolio management. Built with modern, scalable technologies, it caters to retail, day, swing, and algorithmic traders by providing an intuitive interface for strategy creation, backtesting, trading, and analysis.
core_goals: Provide real-time, accurate market data and AI-driven stock predictions to enhance trading decisions.
Deliver a versatile AI-powered trading assistant for personalized market analysis and strategy advice.
Enable comprehensive portfolio management and performance tracking with detailed analytics.
Support simulated paper trading for testing strategies without financial risk.
Offer advanced charting, technical indicators, and pattern recognition to assist technical analysis.
Provide robust stock screening and filtering with multiple criteria.
Facilitate professional-grade backtesting and AI-powered strategy building.
Ensure high security, data privacy, and compliance with industry standards.
Deliver a seamless, accessible user experience across devices with fast performance.
Support scalability and reliability with modern cloud infrastructure and continuous deployment.
key_features: AI-Powered Trading Assistant (TreadGPT) with multi-modal analysis and real-time market data integration.
Advanced AI Prediction Engine combining ensemble machine learning models with real-time confidence scoring.
Professional Backtesting Suite leveraging historical data for detailed strategy testing and optimization.
Unified AI-Powered Strategy Builder with visual design and risk management controls.
Advanced Charting Tools featuring 50+ technical indicators and AI-driven pattern recognition.
Real-Time Stock Screener with extensive filtering, fundamental and technical analysis.
Comprehensive Portfolio Management including risk analytics, asset allocation, and tax optimization.
Market Data & News Integration with AI sentiment analysis and multi-source validation.
Paper Trading System for simulated trading with order and position tracking.
Authentication System with secure email verification and password management.
Watchlist Management with real-time price updates.
Top Gainers & Losers market overview with session-aware updates.
user_flow_summary: User registers or logs in securely with email verification and password management.
User accesses AI Trading Assistant (TreadGPT) to query market data and receive personalized trading advice.
User views AI Predictions for stocks with confidence scores and technical analysis.
User screens stocks using advanced criteria and saves custom screens.
User manages their portfolio by adding positions, viewing analytics, and tracking performance.
User conducts paper trading with simulated orders and monitors positions.
User builds and backtests trading strategies using the AI-powered strategy builder with visual tools.
User explores real-time market data, charts, and top gainers/losers overview.
User sets up price alerts and receives notifications based on predefined criteria.
User accesses news feeds with sentiment analysis to inform trading decisions.
validation_criteria: The platform provides accurate real-time price data with latency under 100ms.
AI prediction models achieve over 85% accuracy and respond within 3 seconds.
Backtesting results include comprehensive analytics like Sharpe ratio, drawdown, and performance metrics.
User authentication is secure with successful email verification and password management.
All key features are responsive, accessible (WCAG 2.1 AA), and perform with page load times under 2 seconds.
Price alerts system reliably sends real-time notifications through email and scheduler.
AI Trading Assistant correctly handles multi-modal inputs and provides relevant market insights.
Portfolio management analytics accurately reflect real-time positions and risk assessments.
Stock screener filters stocks correctly based on multiple user-defined criteria.
The system maintains 99.9% uptime and supports over 10,000 concurrent users with appropriate scaling.
